entries.question: What is the dress code?
entries.answer: Beach Formal! Think sundresses, linen suits, or anything you'd feel great wearing with sand between your toes. The ceremony is on the beach, so plan your footwear accordingly.

entries.question: Can I bring a plus one?
entries.answer: If your invitation includes a plus one, you'll see the option when you RSVP. Due to venue capacity, we can only accommodate guests who are specifically invited.

entries.question: Are kids welcome?
entries.answer: We love your little ones! Kids are welcome at both the ceremony and reception. A kids meal option is available when you RSVP, and we'll have a small activity area at the reception.

entries.question: What if it rains?
entries.answer: Don't worry — we have a backup plan! If the weather doesn't cooperate, the ceremony will move to the covered pavilion at the Community Center, where the reception will also be held.

entries.question: Is the venue wheelchair accessible?
entries.answer: The Community Center reception venue is fully accessible. The beach ceremony site has a boardwalk path, but please reach out to us if you have specific accessibility needs and we'll make sure you're comfortable.

entries.question: Can I take photos during the ceremony?
entries.answer: We'd love an unplugged ceremony — please put your phones away during the 'I dos'! Our amazing photographer will capture everything. After the ceremony, snap away! You can even upload photos to our gallery.

entries.question: Will there be an open bar?
entries.answer: You bet! Beer, wine, and signature cocktails will be flowing all night. Our signature drinks: 'The Fogcutter' (vodka + elderflower + citrus) and 'The Riptide' (rum + coconut + pineapple).

entries.question: What time should I arrive for the ceremony?
entries.answer: The ceremony starts at 4:00 PM sharp. We recommend arriving by 3:30 PM to find parking and settle in. Trust us, you'll want time to enjoy the view!

entries.question: How do I get to Stinson Beach?
entries.answer: Check out our Travel page for detailed directions, hotel recommendations, and transportation tips. The drive from SF is about 45 minutes and incredibly scenic!

entries.question: I have dietary restrictions — can you accommodate me?
entries.answer: Absolutely! When you RSVP, there's a section for dietary restrictions and allergies. Our caterer is experienced with vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and other dietary needs.
